backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing gallery, lesson, user profile, subscription, payment, withdrawal, and file management with Stripe integration, access control, and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old state with mcfPhoneNumber to new state with phonePePaymentsUPI (9392412728-2@axl), bankAccountNumber, and ifscCode fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the requirement to hide or mask the UPI ID '9392412728-2@axl' in frontend payment UI components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of frontend files showing payment pages, subscription components, and hooks that reference phone number 9392412728 and handle PhonePe payment flows.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS defining design tokens in OKLCH color space with forest green and teal palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for 'Diploma Smart Study Hub' application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, dashboard, admin, payment success/failure, content browsing, quizzes, and user management pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/BulkDelete: Alert dialog component for confirming bulk deletion of categories with item counts, showing destructive warning and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/FileDropZo: A drag-and-drop file upload component that validates file types and sizes, accepts multiple files, and provides visual feedback during drag operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryPre: Displays a grid of galleries with their images and videos, providing delete functionality for galleries and individual media items with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryUpl: Handles gallery creation and media uploads (images and videos) with validation, progress tracking, and tabbed interface for organizing content by branch, semester, subject, and chapter.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentTra: Displays a filterable table of payment transactions with status badges, supporting both PhonePe/QR and Stripe payment methods with date formatting and status indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/PdfPreview: A modal dialog component that renders PDF previews in an iframe, accepting either a File object or URL as input.
frontend/src/components/admin/UploadProg: Displays individual file upload progress with status icons, progress bars, upload speed, and retry/remove actions for failed or pending uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserActiva: A confirmation dialog for activating user accounts, displaying user details and warnings about unlocking study materials access.
frontend/src/components/content/GalleryG: Displays a grid of gallery items (images and videos) with locked/unlocked states based on user subscription or admin status, and opens a lightbox on media click.
frontend/src/components/content/LockedCo: Wraps content with a lock overlay and tooltip for non-subscribed/non-admin users, showing a blur effect and lock icon to indicate restricted access.
frontend/src/components/content/MediaLig: Full-screen dialog component for viewing gallery images and videos with navigation controls, keyboard shortcuts, and download functionality.
frontend/src/components/content/PaymentH: Displays a table of payment transactions with status badges, payment methods, amounts, and timestamps, showing loading or empty states as needed.
frontend/src/components/content/PaymentQ: Shows a PhonePe QR code for UPI payment with payment details (amount, UPI ID, phone number) and step-by-step instructions for completing the transaction.
frontend/src/components/content/Subscrip: Modal dialog that prompts non-subscribed users to subscribe, listing benefits and displaying the ₹5/week pricing with a call-to-action button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with branding, navigation links (Quick Links, Resources), social media icons, and copyright information including a privacy policy link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header component with logo, navigation menu, theme toggle, notifications, and authentication controls; includes mobile menu support and admin badge display.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Main layout wrapper component that renders Header, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSubscription: React Query hook that fetches all active subscriptions from the backend actor, returning an array of Principal IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Core hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCheck.ts: Hook that queries the backend to check if the current user has admin privileges, with 5-minute cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPayments.ts: Hook for admins to fetch all payment records from the backend, sorted by timestamp in descending order.
frontend/src/hooks/useContentAccess.ts: Hook that determines content access based on subscription status or admin role, managing a prompt dialog for unauthorized access attempts.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileManagement.ts: Provides mutation hooks for deleting files, video links, important links, categories, and bulk category deletion with query invalidation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useFileUpload.ts: Manages file upload queue with progress tracking, speed calculation, and bulk upload mutation to backend with status updates and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryContent.ts: Provides hooks to fetch galleries by category filters (branch, semester, subject, chapter) and retrieve individual gallery by ID.
Provides React Query mutations for gallery CRUD operations including creating galleries, uploading images/videos, and deleting galleries or individual media items, with toast notifications and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider for ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentConfirmatio: Provides a mutation hook to finalize Stripe checkout sessions, activate subscriptions, and invalidate related queries with success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentHistory.ts: Fetches and sorts the caller's payment records from the backend actor, returning them in descending timestamp order with loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePhonePePayment.ts: Manages PhonePe UPI payments by fetching UPI ID from backend, generating UPI deep links for mobile payments, and providing UPI ID masking utility for display.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Queries the backend actor to check if the user's subscription is active, with automatic refetching every 30 seconds to keep status synchronized.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserActivation.ts: Provides a mutation to activate user accounts by Principal ID, invalidating multiple subscription and user-related queries upon success with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useWithdrawal.ts: Manages withdrawal requests with mutations for submitting requests (with validation for amount and phone number) and queries for fetching all or individual withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH color space for light and dark themes, featuring forest green, sage, and teal accent colors.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function `cn` that combines clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional and conflict-free CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the About page with mission statement, feature cards (comprehensive content, focused learning, community, recognition), and reasons to choose the platform for diploma students.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with withdrawal request functionality, requiring admin permissions check. Displays stats cards and allows admins to submit withdrawal requests with phone number validation (minimum ₹50).
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContentManageme: Admin content management interface for uploading and managing gallery content organized by branch, semester, subject, and chapter. Includes admin permission checks and dynamic subject filtering based on selected branch.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Admin page component for managing users, displaying active subscriptions, payment transactions, and user activation controls with admin permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/BranchSelectionPage.t: Shows a grid of engineering branch cards (CSE, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, Other) with icons and descriptions, linking to branch-specific content pages.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Displays user's earned certificates with download functionality, requires authentication, and shows empty state if no certificates exist.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form for users to send messages and displays contact information (email, phone, location) in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/pages/ContentBrowserPage.ts: Main content browsing interface showing semesters, subjects, chapters, and study materials (PDFs, notes, videos, links, galleries) with subscription-based access control and admin features.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard displaying subscription status with active/inactive badges, learning progress overview, and prompts to subscribe or manage subscription based on current status.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, features grid showcasing study resources (PDFs, videos, quizzes, images), pricing card (₹5/week), and testimonials section for diploma engineering students.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Protected page displaying user rankings with score, downloads, and quiz stats; includes tabs for weekly/monthly/all-time leaderboards and user's current rank card.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Authentication page with Internet Identity login and disabled password login form; redirects admins to admin dashboard and regular users to user dashboard after successful login.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Payment failure confirmation page showing error message for payment to phone number 9392412728 with retry and contact support options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success confirmation page displaying ₹5 weekly subscription details, unlocked content types (PDFs, videos, images, links), and call-to-action to start exploring materials.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Protected user profile page showing account information (email, roll number, join date), statistics (downloads, quiz average, study hours), and edit profile option.
frontend/src/pages/QuizListPage.tsx: Displays a grid of available quizzes with details like subject, duration, and completion status. Redirects unauthenticated users to login and allows navigation to individual quiz pages.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Renders an individual quiz interface with a timer, progress bar, and multiple-choice question with radio button options. Includes navigation between questions and requires authentication.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersPage.tsx: Manages study reminders with a list view and dialog for creating new reminders (exams, assignments, study sessions) with date, time, and notes. Requires authentication and displays reminders with color-coded type badges.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Handles subscription management with PhonePe payment integration, manual payment confirmation via QR code, and displays payment history. Shows subscription status alerts and requires authentication for payment actions.
frontend/src/utils/fileValidation.ts: Utility functions for validating file uploads including size limits (50MB for files, 100MB for videos), file type checking, and formatting file sizes and upload speeds.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes, container settings, border radius variables, custom shadows, animations, and typography plugin integration.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting PhonePe payment integration features, including pending requests to update UPI ID to '9392412728-2@axl' and hide/obscure it in the UI.
